content:
I'm sorry that the previous ASCII art examples did not meet your expectations. ASCII art can be subjective and can vary in style and complexity depending on the artist and the characters used.

Here's another example of an ASCII art heart that you might like:

,#####,

|aa|
| u |
\ = /
|\_\_\_/|

========

` `"` `"`
I hope you find this ASCII art heart more to your liking. If you have any other specific requirements or preferences for an ASCII art heart, please let me know and I will try my best to provide an appropriate example. \<′‘/\_./‘‘"‘‘"‘IhopeyoufindthisASCIIartheartmoretoyourliking.IfyouhaveanyotherspecificrequirementsorpreferencesforanASCIIartheart,pleaseletmeknowandIwilltrymybesttoprovideanappropriateexample.
